data.message: Been active at FB since my retirement in March, posting greetings daily!!! LOL... in awe how we can connect instantly with far-away family and friends, free!!! Gone are the days where you wait in queue just to get in touch!!! FB lets you become sensitive and open-minded to various  news/issues if you read and understand with open mind!!! Thanks for the opportunity!!! A Blessed new year ahead to all users!!!

replies.message: Thanks for sharing, Shalom! Your kind words mean a lot to us. <3 -Jordan
